Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-36387 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.61-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-36387 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.61-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package httpd is earlier than 2.4.61-1, affected by CVE-2024-36387
